items.title: Wildmoor Whisky CN - Home
items.keyWords: WILDMOOR Dark Moorland 23 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky,WILDMOOR Rugged Coast 30 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky,WILDMOOR Black Mountain 40 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky,WILDMOOR Waking Forest 23 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky,WILDMOOR Tropical Coast 30 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky,远慕
items.description: WILDMOOR - A Whisky More Wild. Drawn from the William Grant & Sons family private reserve of whiskies -  these are extremely rare and prestige liquids from far-flung distilleries all over Scotland, some of which are lost forever.

items.storyChapterTwoComponentDescription: 源自格兰特·戈登家族的陈年储备，历经数十余载的岁月，汇集珍稀原料，而这，便是远慕之使命。
items.storyChapterTwoComponentFifth: 从来私有，此刻愿你拥有。

items.nearYouDes: 过去都是假的，回忆是一条没有归途的路，以往的一切春天都无法复原，即使最狂热最坚贞的爱情，归根结底也不过是一种瞬息即逝的现实，唯有孤独永恒。
